src:
VIDEO: Ob tem, kar je upokojenka povedala o Nemcu, je Ramšakova ostala odprtih ust
Pisteljica Milena Miklavčič je predstavila novo knjigo.
05 Nov 2019, 09:58 by P. K.
Pisateljica in upokojenka Milena Miklavčič se te dni mudi po različnih koncih Slovenije zaradi promocije nove knjige, v kateri so predstavljene spolne in ljubezenske navade moških pri nas. V njej so na več kot 500 straneh zbrane necenzurirane pripovedi dedkov, sinov in vnukov. Vsega skupaj je razodetih več kot 300 moških usod, zgodb izpred 100 in še malo let vse do danes, ki nastavljajo ogledalo vsem nam. Knjigo je predstavila tudi v jutranjem programu v šovu Denisa Avdića. Čisto za konec jo je Avdić vprašal, kakšno je njeno mnenje o poslancu Matjažu Nemcu. Brez dlake na jeziku je dejala: »Matjaž Nemec je lepotec in o lepotcih nimam nikoli najboljšega mnenja.«Izjava je odprtih ust pustila predvsem Anjo Ramšak, ki je Nemčeva velika oboževalka.
text:
VIDEO: Ramsak's mouth remained open when the pensioner said about the German
Pistel Milena Miklavcic presented a new book.
05 Nov 2019, 09:58 by P.K.
Writer and pensioner Milena Miklavcic is in a hurry across different parts of Slovenia these days to promote a new book that outlines the sexual and love habits of men in our country. It contains over 500 pages of uncensored narratives of grandparents, sons and grandchildren. In all, more than 300 male destinies, stories from 100 years ago and a few years to the present, are revealed, which set the mirror for us all. She also presented the book in the morning program of Denis Avdic's show. Finally, Avdic asked her what her opinion was on MP Matjaz German. Without a hair on her tongue, she said, "Matjaz German is a beauty, and I never have the best opinion on beauty."
